title: Slug to kg Converter – convert slugs to kilograms (and kg to slugs)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: kg = slug × 14.593902937 slug = kg ÷ 14.593902937 This factor comes from: 1 slug is the mass that accelerates 1 ft/s² when acted on by 1 lbf; using standard gravity and lbm definitions you get 1 slug ≈ 32.174 lbm ≈ 14.5939 kg.
